about_the_game: Immerse yourself in the universe of Muv-Luv with our brand-new monthly magazine for fans, now available in English! It's bursting with exclusive content, including in-depth insights into the world of Muv-Luv, top-secret intel on the characters, and a comprehensive feature on Tactical Surface Fighters. It's packed with information on the world of Muv-Luv!
